entry.title: Preparing for the Workshop
entry.content: To maximize time for hands-on activities, all participants should install the required software outlined in Pre-Workshop in advance. In cases where installs prove difficult, participants should reach out to instructors before the workshop for troubleshooting. People will be available for real-time assistance throughout the workshop too.
